Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute near Cicero/Cermak
ShortDescription: #21 buses temp. rerouted EB via Cermak, Austin, 16th, Cicero, Cermak; WB via Cermak, Kostner, 16th, Austin, Cermak, due to a parade near Cicero/Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to the Mexican Independence Day Parade near Cicero/Cermak.

Eastbound buses will operate via Cermak, Austin, 16th, and Cicero, then resume their normal route on Cermak.

Westbound buses will operate via Cermak, Kostner, 16th, and Austin, then resume their normal route on Cermak.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54B South Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Cermak
ShortDescription: #54B buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 16th, and 47 Court, due to a parade near Cicero/Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, 16th, 47th Court, and Cicero, due to the Mexican Independence Day Parade near Cicero/Cermak.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Damen
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Damen due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Damen due to a mechanical problem on a train. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
